title: La Liga Team of the Week competition: Win a Deportivo shirt
description: Enter Sky Sports' La Liga Team of the Week competition to win the shirt of your favourite La Liga club!
content: During the final stretch the 2017/18 season, we are giving fans in the United Kingdom and Republic of Ireland a chance to win an official replica shirt from each of La Liga Santander's 20 clubs.For the next few weeks, we'll be presenting a new question for fans to answer about our featured La Liga Team of the Week.To enter the competition each week, visit www.skysports.com/la-liga or look for the La Liga Team of the Week post on @SkyRevista and correctly answer the question about the La Liga club featured that week.From now until late May, we'll be working our way up the La Liga table, concluding with the shirt of the newly crowned La Liga Santander champion following the last matchday of the season.This week you can win a Deportivo La Coruna shirt. Just answer the question below:Closing date is 6am on Monday January 29.
